title: Sensor Box for Wear
summary: Test Sensor ability in android wear watch. Simple sensor graphic and application
description: Describe:This Apps testing sensor ability in Android Wear watch.  Support Android 4.3 or above and Bluetooth4.0  Support Moto360 Round LCD Display This is a completely different UI/UX experience for using round LCD displayFunction:Demonstration sensor application ( Heart Rate Monitor, Compass, Metal detector, Angle meter. Balance ball) and also simple sensor testing in graphic. List the number of sensor type support in the Android Wear devices.The Apps will automatically  the shape of LCD display. Support:            LG G Watch           Samsung Gear live            Moto360              or later device for Android Wear
descriptionHTML:
Describe:
This Apps testing sensor ability in Android Wear watch.

Support Android 4.3 or above and Bluetooth4.0

Support Moto360 Round LCD Display
This is a completely different UI/UX experience for using round LCD display


Function:
Demonstration sensor application ( Heart Rate Monitor, Compass, Metal detector, Angle meter. Balance ball) and also simple sensor testing in graphic. List the number of sensor type support in the Android Wear devices.
The Apps will automatically the shape of LCD display.

Support:
LG G Watch
Samsung Gear live
Moto360
or later device for Android Wear
comments: Quite good. but can you support the "Rotation Vector" sensor also? please.  It should be quite simple because you already supported many sensors such as acc, gyro, magnetic and linear acc.  "Rotation Vector" is provided by Android API.
Would love a recording feature with data export!!
Just what I was looking for
recentChanges: 2. New Compass UI for Round LCD
3. New Metal Detector UI for Round LCD
4. New Angle Meter UI for Round LCD
5. New UI/UX for Round LCD , user can          experience completely different operation
